Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: SB #34 and #119 buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Southbound #34 South Michigan and #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, State, and 117th, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction at Michigan/115th.

Headline: Blue Line Delays, Limited Service Between O'Hare and Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service experiencing delays due to signal problems at O'Hare; limited service via train shuttle available btwn O'Hare & Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service experiencing delays due to signal problems at O'Hare.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Forest Park and Rosemont, and,
  • between Rosemont and O'Hare, with limited service.

Change trains at Rosemont for continuing service to/from O'Hare.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
